name: Blocky Road Blaster - 3D ( Fun Race & Shoot Game )
name_original: Blocky Road Blaster - 3D ( Fun Race & Shoot Game )
description:
'Blocky Road Blaster' is a high-octane, explosion-filled car game where your goal is to survive for as long as possible, and destroy as many other vehicles as you can along the way Creating hubbub on the streets in this crazy, reactions-based driving and shooting game and survival challenge all rolled into one!

Unlock 13 destruction car / blast cars through traffic / pick weapons,power-ups / Collect coins / Upgrade Weapons

Addictive Game-play/ Smooth Controls- better then traffic racer / Beautiful Block Graphics / Cool Shooting Effects for each weapon / Vibrant Sounds / Total Free Game (No Need to buy in-apps)


Please give it a try and let us know your suggestions.
